name: Golden Agri-Resources Ltd
bossPosition: Vice President Corporate Communications, Sustainability Relations
goal:
L'explication et la promotion des différents aspects concernant la plantation et la production de l'huile de palme (et ses multiples produits de consommation) en Indonésie. On aimerait développer un réseau de confiance auprès des multiples parties concernées dans l'Union Européenne.

Explanation and promotion of the different aspects in regard of plantation management and the production of palm oil (and its use in many consumer products) in Indonesia. We would like to build a trust-based relationship with the different stakeholders in the European Union.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Environnement, Déforestation, Energie Renouvelable, Santé, Agriculture, Droits sociaux, Relation entre l'UE et l'Indonésie (inclus les negotiations de la CEPA).

Environment, Deforestation, Renewable energy, Health, Agriculture, Social Rights, Relationship between the European Union and Indonesia (including the Free Trade Agreement)
